Fri, 29 Dec 2023 01:57:21 +0000 Heavy rain warnings and watches are in place for much of New Zealand as the new year approaches. Photo / NZME
Holiday road toll: Tributes pour for Irishman killed in Christmas Day crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/holiday-road-toll-tributes-pour-for-irishman-killed-in-christmas-day-crash/YUX7BEPJCBACLCS66RP37NXPVA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/holiday-road-toll-tributes-pour-for-irishman-killed-in-christmas-day-crash/YUX7BEPJCBACLCS66RP37NXPVA/ Ben TomsettTim O'Dwyer, 20, died in a car crash in Allenton, Ashburton, on Christmas Day. Fri, 29 Dec 2023 01:26:55 +0000 A fire at the summit of Te Mata Peak in November last year. The cause was confirmed to be fireworks.
